C

com.ridemetric.sdk - package com.ridemetric.sdk
 
connect(Context, RideMetric.TripListener, RideMetric.ConnectionListener) - Static method in class com.ridemetric.sdk.RideMetric
Connects the client to Ridemetric SDK service This method returns immediately, and connects to the service in the background.

stopService(Context) - Static method in class com.ridemetric.sdk.RideMetric
Closes the connection to Ridemetric SDK service No calls can be made using this client after calling this method.
stopTrip() - Static method in class com.ridemetric.sdk.RideMetric
